verses.roman:
'nirgranthā eva' hañā, 'api'--nirdhāraṇe
ei 'ūnaṣaṣṭi' prakāra artha kariluṅ vyākhyāne

synonyms: nirgranthā—the word nirgranthā; eva—also the word eva; hañā—becoming; api—the word api; nirdhāraṇe—in fixation; ei ūnaṣaṣṭi prakāra artha—in this way fifty-nine imports; kariluṅ vyākhyāne—I have described.
translation: "Then taking the word nirgranthā and considering api in the sense of sustenance, I have tried to explain fifty-nine meanings of the word.
